actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional copies of the report on the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for fiscal year 1979.

summary.text: Authorizes the printing, for the use of the Senate Committee on the Budget, of 1,000 copies of its report on the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for Fiscal Year 1979.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional copies of the report on the First Concurrent Resolution on the Budget for fiscal year 1979.
